DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Open-label Study Comparing Two Different Rabies Vaccine Schedules Chinese Children Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This study design evaluate safety immunogenicity Rabipur Zagreb ( 2-1-1 ) Rabipur Essen ( 1-1-1-1-1 ) simulate post exposure vaccination schedule Chinese child old adult . Subjects randomize Group 1 ( Zagreb ) receive 4 dos rabies vaccine Day 1 ( 2 dos ) , Day 8 Day 22 . Subjects randomize Group 2 ( Essen ) receive 5 dos rabies vaccine Days 1 , 4 , 8 , 15 , 29 . First vaccine administer study Day 1 . 240 child 400 old adult , total 640 , plan enrol study . Subjects divide age subset equal number within age cohort ( child : 6 11 year age 12 17 year age ; old adult : 51 60 year age 61 year age older . Within age subset , subject assign randomly 1:1 ratio . The primary objective establish non-inferiority Rabipur Zagreb ( 2-1-1 ) schedule relative conventional Rabipur Essen ( 1-1-1-1-1 ) schedule base geometric mean titer ( GMC ) , secondary objective ass percent subject rabies virus neutralize titer ≥ 0.5 IU/mL 14 day first vaccination ( study Day 15 ) schedule age cohort
